name: Apple BD
description: We are here to help these people who want to buy apple mobiles. This is virtual service people can easily order products and cancel their order.This has an admin panel normal users can see their orders. they can give review. Admin users can do all normal users can do and also manage all orders , Add new service, Make someone admin.
